description: Subdivision of site (No. 51 Burdon Lane) and erection of a single storey side and rear extension and a first floor extension to existing annexe building to create a two-storey 8-bedroomed nursing home with roof accommodation, a rear dormer and rooflights to front and side roof slopes and alterations to fenestration.
